Module RoboRally
Package client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Client
  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the clients.
    All clients connect to one server.

      • connectClient

        public boolean connectClient()
        This method is responsible for connecting the client to the specified server. It uses the {@link @FXML fieldServer} to get the IP and Port.
        Returns:
        true if connection could be established.

      • sendPlayerValues

        public void sendPlayerValues​(java.lang.String name,
                             int figure)
        This method is responsible for sending playerValues to the server. The server is going to process the values and if valid, it will return a playerAdded message. It uses the {@link @FXML fieldName} to get the name and chooseRobot FXML to get figure.

      • sendStartingPoint

        public void sendStartingPoint​(java.lang.String id)
        This method is responsible for sending the chosen startingpoint to the server
        Parameters:
        id - The x and y coordinate of the startingpoint

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        This method is responsible for sending ordinary messages to the server. The server is going to process the messages based on whether it is a private or ordinary message. It uses the {@link @FXML chatInput} to get the message content.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that should be sent.

      • sendPrivateMessage

        public void sendPrivateMessage​(java.lang.String message,
                               int receiverID)
        This method is responsible for sending private messages to the server. The server is going to process the messages based on whether it is a private or ordinary message. It uses the {@link @FXML chatInput} to get the message content.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that should be sent.
        receiverID - The playerID of the Player who should receive the private message.

      • sendReadyStatus

        public void sendReadyStatus​(boolean readyStatus)
        This method is responsible for sending the players ready status to the server. Note: A game starts automatically when all players (at least 2 players) are ready.

      • sendSelectedCard

        public void sendSelectedCard​(Card card,
                             int register)
        This method is responsible for sending the players selected cards to the server.
        Parameters:
        card - The selected card
        register - The desired register

      • sendPlayCard

        public void sendPlayCard​(Card card)
        This method is responsible for sending the played cards to the server.
        Parameters:
        card - The played card

      • receiveMessage

        public void receiveMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        This method is responsible for printing a message to the chat history.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that should be printed.
